about.title: About Me
about.content: A passionate educator and lifelong learner with a deep love for mathematics and its applications. From tutoring to research, I bring creativity and innovation to every aspect of my work.

academicWorks.title: Academic Works
academicWorks.content: Here are some of my key academic projects and theses:

works.title: Mathematical Epidemiology: From Data to Model
works.description: An exploration of simple epidemic models and their application to real-world data.

works.title: Entanglement-assisted zero-error communication
works.description: Investigation of zero-error communication capacity of noisy classical channels using shared entanglement.

works.title: Stability of Enzymatic Reaction Chains
works.description: Analysis of the stability of enzymatic reaction chains using mathematical modeling.

interests.title: Interests
interests.content: Besides mathematics, I have a strong interest in data science, photography, and music. These diverse passions inform my interdisciplinary approach to problem-solving and creativity in both my teaching and consultancy work.

languages.title: Languages
languages.content: Fluent in English and Dutch, I can effectively communicate mathematical ideas across language barriers, making me well-suited for international educational environments.

teaching.title: About Teaching
teaching.content: My dedication to education is further underscored by my teaching certification, allowing me to teach mathematics at all levels up to university. This enables me to adapt my teaching style to students of all ages and abilities, making complex concepts accessible and engaging.

education.title: Education
education.content: Master in Mathematics, specializing in quantum computing and dynamic systems.
education.expanded: With a Master in Mathematics, my specializations include quantum computing, dynamic systems, and data science. My research spans quantum mechanics, linear algebra, differential equations, and chaos theory.

tutoring.title: Tutoring Experience
tutoring.content: Started tutoring in high school, now offering personalized lessons in mathematics and data science.
tutoring.expanded: In high school, I went from a 4 to a 10 in mathematics. This journey ignited my passion for teaching and led me to start my tutoring business, charging €10 per hour while others charged €5, because I was a 10.

research.title: Research Highlight
research.content: Working on an archive about the founders of computer science in the Netherlands, in collaboration with Professor Gerard Albert.
research.details: Contributed to groundbreaking research projects related to computer science and the foundations of mathematics.

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.content: Proficient in Next.js, AI integration, and developing innovative educational tools. Building a web application that integrates AI for automatic note-taking and summarization features.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.summary: A summary of my expertise in various fields.

advancedEducation.title: Advanced Education
advancedEducation.details: I hold a Master's degree in Mathematics, with specializations in quantum informatics, dynamic systems, and data science. My academic background includes a strong focus on advanced mathematical concepts such as quantum mechanics, linear algebra, and chaos theory, as well as practical applications in real-world scenarios.

diverseKnowledge.title: Diverse Mathematical Knowledge
diverseKnowledge.details: My expertise spans various mathematical fields, including quantum informatics, complex analysis, differential equations, and mathematical modeling. My research projects, such as those on entanglement-assisted zero-error communication, demonstrate my ability to apply advanced mathematical theories to solve complex problems.

teachingProficiency.title: Teaching Proficiency
teachingProficiency.details: With over 15 years of experience in teaching mathematics and data science, I have developed a deep understanding of pedagogy. My teaching certification qualifies me to teach mathematics at all levels, from high school to university, allowing me to make difficult concepts accessible to students of all ages and abilities.

researchExperience.title: Research Experience
researchExperience.details: I have collaborated on key research projects, such as an archive documenting the founders of computer science in the Netherlands, in collaboration with Professor Gerard Albert. These projects have deepened my understanding of the historical and foundational aspects of mathematics and computer science.

appliedMathematics.title: Applied Mathematics
appliedMathematics.details: My work in data consultancy involves applying mathematical concepts to solve practical problems. From statistical analysis and machine learning to data modeling, I bring a robust mathematical approach to real-world applications, ensuring precise and effective results.

interdisciplinaryApproach.title: Interdisciplinary Approach
interdisciplinaryApproach.details: In addition to mathematics, I am passionate about data science, music, and photography. This interdisciplinary mindset enhances my problem-solving skills, allowing me to approach mathematical challenges from unique perspectives, whether through visual data analysis or algorithmic music composition.

programmingSkills.title: Programming Skills
programmingSkills.details: I am proficient in various programming languages, including Python, JavaScript, and frameworks like Next.js. I have integrated AI into my educational tools, automating tasks such as note-taking and summaries, and I regularly apply machine learning techniques to optimize data-driven projects.

mathematicalCommunication.title: Mathematical Communication
mathematicalCommunication.details: Fluent in English and Dutch, I am adept at communicating complex mathematical ideas across linguistic and cultural barriers. My experience teaching in diverse educational settings has refined my ability to simplify intricate concepts and convey them clearly to both academic and non-academic audiences.

problemSolving.title: Problem-Solving Skills
problemSolving.details: Throughout my academic and professional journey, I have honed my analytical and problem-solving skills. Whether it's solving complex mathematical equations, troubleshooting data models, or developing innovative software solutions, I thrive on tackling challenging problems with a logical and methodical approach.

lifelongLearner.title: Lifelong Learner
lifelongLearner.details: I am deeply committed to continuous learning, always staying updated on the latest advancements in mathematics, technology, and related fields. This dedication to self-improvement ensures that my skills remain sharp and that I can offer the most cutting-edge solutions in both teaching and consulting.

researchAppliedMath.title: Research and Applied Mathematics
researchAppliedMath.details: My research covers various aspects of applied mathematics, including stability analysis of systems, zero-error communication in quantum channels, and data science techniques. These projects demonstrate my ability to bridge the gap between theory and application, making significant contributions to both academic and industrial fields.
